contentItem.title: CSA
contentItem.metaDescription: Oracle Commerce Accelerator Shipping Policy page content.

mainContent.content:
Shipping Policy

Ground Shipping

CSA will deliver items that are available for immediate shipment in 3-5 business days at the rates described below. Please note that delivery of merchandise that requires special handling will take approximately two additional weeks.

For Orders up to $14.99 US the Shipping Rate is $4.75 US.
For Orders from $15 - $49.99 US the Shipping Rate is $5.95 US.
For Orders $50.00 US and up the Shipping Rate is $6.50 US.

Two Day Shipping

CSA will deliver items that are available for immediate shipment in two business days at a flat rate of $9.50 US.

Next Day Shipping

CSA will deliver items that are available for immediate shipment overnight at a flat rate of $18.95 US.
